content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I am glad you like the apartment. Let's negotiate the rent. What is your first offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am looking for a fair price for this apartment. I would like to pay 500 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That is too low for me. Remember, this is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities. I am looking for a higher price. Make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that this is a prime location. I am willing to pay 600 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That is a better offer, but I am still looking for more. This apartment is in high demand. Make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the quality of the apartment and its location, I am prepared to pay 700 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That is a significant increase. However, I still believe this apartment is worth more. Make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe my offer of 700 Euro per month is fair for both parties.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Emilia. I wish you the best in your future apartment search.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time as well. If you reconsider my offer, please let me know. Good day!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
